description: Generate embeddings using a specified provider.

model.info: Select the embedding model to use

api_base.info: Base URL for the API. Leave empty for default.

dimensions.info: The number of dimensions the resulting output embeddings should have. Only supported by certain models.

chunk_size.info: Number of texts to process in each batch when generating embeddings.

request_timeout.info: Timeout in seconds for API requests.

max_retries.info: Maximum number of retries for failed API requests.

show_progress_bar.info: Whether to display a progress bar during embedding generation.

model_kwargs.info: Additional keyword arguments to pass to the model.

errors.openai_api_key_required: OpenAI API key is required when using OpenAI provider
errors.failed_to_create_embeddings: Failed to create embeddings for provider '{provider}': {error}
